channel.title: Arabic on Video Translator
channel.description: Recent content in Arabic on Video Translator

item.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
item.description: Previously we’ve gone through the list of our English speaking AI and the different dialects they speak. You can see them all here. In this article we’re looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different dialects and voices available. If you need a reminder as to how to select the appropriate AI language and dialect, check out our article here. Now, on to the voices! We’ve used the phrase birds of a feather, flock together or الطيور على أشكالها تقع for our AI to say each time for the examples.
